scripts.setup: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && go install github.com/air-verse/air@latest && go install github.com/air-verse/air@latest"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && make dev" "cd backend/web && npx tailwindcss -i ./static/css/input.css -o ./static/css/output.css --watch"
